home.title: Full stack developer, designer, and open source enthusiast
home.description: I’m Evan, a full stack developer based in Chengdu, China. I like to build products that help people live better lives, I wish to make the world a better place.

newsletter.title: Stay up to date

articles.title: I write about things I’m learning and things I’m building.
articles.description: All of my long-form thoughts on programming, open source, infrastructure, and more, collected in chronological order.
